professional_summary: Experienced Oracle Database Administrator with expertise in database security, backup/recovery, performance tuning, and data guard configuration. Proven track record in managing large-scale projects, ensuring on-time delivery, and driving organizational growth through technical proficiency.

key_responsibilities: Administering Oracle databases and ensuring proper security and performance.
Implementing backup and recovery solutions using RMAN and performing regular disaster recovery drills.
Configuring DataGuard for high availability and fail-over purposes.
Migrating large databases across multiple platforms and optimizing SQL queries.
Assisting development teams in addressing database-related issues such as network failures and ASM disk group errors.
Configuring GoldenGate for real-time data integration.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science (Databases)
